summary: The 'Insure Cybersecurity Act of 2025' mandates the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information to establish a working group on cyber insurance. This group, composed of government and cybersecurity experts, will define terms, analyze policy provisions, gather industry input, and develop customer recommendations. The Assistant Secretary will then disseminate informative resources based on the group's report, focusing on stakeholder education and promoting best practices for cyber insurance.
